description: Chris Blackburn  is with  Tim Bangert  and  3 others . Well, I'm a man of my word.  A few weeks back, I lost a bet to my good friend  Grant Christy  when my Cincinnati Bengals lost to his Buffalo Bills.  As such, this Sunday, December 18, I will be spreading Holiday Joy to drivers in Downtown Hilliard from 1:00 - 2:00 dressed as a holiday moose and dancing to current pop hits and Christmas Classics.  To make this something worth while besides watching a man perform terrible dancing in a moose outfit, I will donate $1 for any honks I receive or $2 for each person that comes and gets their picture with the holiday moose.  The donations will go to Tim Bangert's Let it Grom Team to help fight cancer, Jennifer Kegyes's Hope for HIE Foundation, and Faith Mission to help feed the hungry.  So if you want to help out charity, or just see an idiot dance as a result of poor Bengals football, drive on by between 1:00 - 2:00 this Sunday.  I'll be near the road next to the Hilliard water fountains. Chris Kari Blackburn Hope for HIE Foundation - Hypoxic Ischemic Encephalopathy Kari
